name: 99¢ a Gallon
description:
This excellently MS Paint drawn adventure has you seeking out sarcophagi in many areas. Have lots of fun!

A & D to move left and right,

left click to spawn in a vacuum bomb, left click to activate it,

scroll wheel to zoom in and out,

space, W, and enter to interact or enter levels, begin game etc...

R/P to reset the game in case of a softlock.
